amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for Peacekeeping Operations by $50 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for Peacekeeping Operations by $50,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Capuano amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 213 - 208 (Roll no. 46).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Capuano.
